scripts.dev:install: npm install && cd backend && nvm use && npm install && cd ../frontend && nvm use && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.client: cd frontend && nvm use && npm run dev
scripts.server: cd backend && nvm use && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
